message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, both Emma and Samantha are ancestors of Emily. This is derived from the chains: Emma -> Andrea -> Bruce -> Julie -> Eugene -> Virginia -> Mary -> Diane -> Ryan -> Wayne -> Randy -> Emily and Samantha -> Sandra -> Susan -> Ruth -> Elizabeth -> Rebecca -> Cynthia -> Lori -> Jerry -> Frances -> Joan -> John -> Vincent -> Anthony -> Ashley -> Sophia -> Evelyn -> Megan -> Dylan -> Dorothy -> Gregory -> Helen -> Denise -> Pamela -> Stephanie -> Jack -> Sarah -> Philip -> Maria -> Stephen -> Kayla -> Jessica -> Doris -> Amy -> Larry -> Bobby -> Raymond -> Natalie -> Bryan -> Ethan -> Jacob -> Alexis -> Jonathan -> Amber -> Kevin -> Olivia -> Lauren -> Jordan -> Alice -> Sara -> Patrick -> Kelly -> Emily. Therefore, Emma and Samantha share a common descendant, which is Emily.

<ANSWER>1</ANSWER>
